content.question: The number of people who have entered a museum on a certain day is modeled by a function f(t), where t is measured in hours since the museum opened that day. The number of people who have left the museum since it opened that same day is modeled by a function g(t). If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>380</mn> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mn>1.02</mn> </mrow> <mi>t</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45CD@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>g</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>240</mn> <mo>+</mo> <mn>240</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>π</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F53@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, at what time t, for 1 ≤ t ≤ 11, is the number of people in the museum at a maximum?

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
